snippet.title: WizardChess - (Re)Launch Trailer [v0.5]
snippet.description:
WizardChess is OUT NOW
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1274210/WizardChess/
It is a chess-based roguelike deckbuilder.

Slightly a year after it's initial release, 'The Song of the Fae' is RE-Launching as 'WizardChess'. Individual run progression, basic mechanics, and gameplay emphasis have all been so heavily reworked in that time, that a re-brand felt right.

I am so thrilled to announce my partnership with TwoPM Studios. I found their game to be a hidden gem, and loved their mentality towards development, always aiming to do what's best for the game!
